item.title: Facebook Meets Twitter & FriendFeed
item.description: <img src="/media/facebook-logo.png" alt="Image via CrunchBase" /> <figcaption> <p> Image via CrunchBase </p> </figcaption> For the past few months Facebook has been obsessed with Twitter. It’s easy to see why. Twitter is addicitve. Many twitter users are constantly on twitter. Whenever you goto twitter there is always something new happening. Facebook obviously wants this experience on facebook. Why not copy twitter. I think Facebook could do it and do it better.
